title: Quickest way to get a response from Riot? (HELP!)
body:
Hello!

Just trying to see if anyone knows the quickest way to get a response from riot? Someone appears to be on my friends account (Rossy) and has been trolling and intent feeding on it for the last 3-4 hours or so.  Is there anything that can be done about it without having access to the account because I can't get a hold of him?

replies.body: this is also my problem I think they'll respond every 24 hours? like it's ridiculous.
